view

Class InvestmentView

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.InvestmentView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InvestmentViewInterface

    public class InvestmentView
extends java.lang.Object
implements InvestmentViewInterface
    This class is the view that will contain everything that is to be displayed by the application.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      InvestmentView(java.lang.Appendable view)
